item.title: Raichur: Illegal goshala demolished by Municipal Corporation
item.description:
<![CDATA[Mumbai (PTI): A magistrate's inquiry has held five Maharashtra policemen responsible for the custodial death of Akshay Shinde, the lone accused in the Badlapur school sexual assault case, and raised doubts on their claims of opening fire at him in self-defence in September last year.
Magistrate Ashok Shengde, in his report tendered in a sealed cover to the Bombay High Court on Monday, noted allegations levelled by Akshay Shinde's parents -- that their son was killed in a fake encounter -- has f...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
